definitions.definition: ( of an object taller than its width and depth ) An inclination away from the vertical .
examples: The trees had various leans toward gaps in the canopy.

main_definition: ( of an object taller than its width and depth ) An inclination away from the vertical .

definitions.definition: ( uncountable ) Meat with no fat on it.
( countable , biology ) An organism that is lean in stature .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Meat with no fat on it.
secondary_definitions: ( countable , biology ) An organism that is lean in stature .

definitions.definition: A recreational drug based on codeine -laced promethazine cough syrup , especially popular in the hip hop community in the southeastern United States .

main_definition: ( slang , US ) A recreational drug based on codeine -laced promethazine cough syrup , especially popular in the hip hop community in the southeastern United States .
